message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique features and value, I'm asking for $20,000.  I think you'll find this to be a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is still quite a leap from your proposed $15,000.  To make this work, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my final offer, as it reflects the true value of this product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $16,000?
